title: Another ship with gas sails in; sufficient for six days: LITRO
body_lines: Another 3,900 MT shipment of Liquid Petroleum Gas (LPG) arrived in the country this morning, LITRO Gas Lanka Limited said.
They said they are planning to pay the balance of US$2.5 million and unload the shipment today.
With the latest consignment of gas, LITRO said it would be able to continue with the domestic gas supply for another six days (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
